option.value: Enum_Classe.Alchemist|True| |1|Innate: Alchemists ignore collision and never stop moving.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Assassin|True|Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance.|3|+75% Critical Strike Damage & 10% Critical Strike Chance|6|+150% Critical Strike Damage & 20% Critical Strike Chance|-2| || Enum_Classe.Avatar|True| |1|An Avatar's Origin Element is counted twice for Trait bonuses.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Berserker|True|Innate: At the start of combat, Berserkers leap to the nearest enemy. Berserkers have a 40% chance to hit all units in a cone in front of them with their attacks.|3|40% Chance|6|100% Chance|-2| || Enum_Classe.Blademaster|True|Blademaster Basic Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger additional attacks against their target.|2|One Extra Attacks|4|Two Extra Attacks|6|Three Extra Attacks|| Enum_Classe.Druid|True| |2|Druids regenerate 40 health each second.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Mage|True|Mages have a chance on cast to instead Doublecast.|3|50% Chancer|6|100% Chance|-2| || Enum_Classe.Mystic|True|All allies gain increased Magic Resistance.|2|40 Magic Resistance|4|120 Magic Resistance|-2| || Enum_Classe.Predator|True| |3|Predators instantly kill enemies they damage who are below 25% health.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Ranger|True|Every 3 seconds, Rangers have a chance to double their Attack Speed for 3 seconds.|2|30% Chance to Double Attack Speed|4|60% Chance to Double Attack Speed|6|00% Chance to Double Attack Speed|| Enum_Classe.Summoner|True|Summoned units have increased health and duration.|3|+40% increase|6|+100% increase|-2| || Enum_Classe.Warden|True|Wardens gain increased total Armor.|2|+125% Armorh|4|+275% Armor|6|+450% Armor|| Enum_Classe.Cloud|False|All allies gain dodge chance.|2|+15% Dodge Chance|3|+20% Dodge Chance|4|+30% Dodge Chance|| Enum_Classe.Crystal|False|Crystal champions have a maximum amount of damage they can take from a single hit.|2|100 Max Damage|4|60 Max Damage|-2| || Enum_Classe.Desert|False|Reduces each enemy's armor.|2|50% Armor Reduction|4|90% Armor Reduction|-2| || Enum_Classe.Electric|False|Electric champions shock nearby enemies whenever they deal or receive a critical strike.|2|70 Damage|3|250 Damage|4|500 Damage|| Enum_Classe.Glacial|False|Basic Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun their target for 1.5 seconds.|2|20% Chance to Stun|4|40% Chance to Stun|6|60% Chance to Stun|| Enum_Classe.Inferno|False|Inferno spell damage burns the ground beneath the target, dealing a percent of that spell's pre-mitigation damage as magic damage over 5 seconds.|3|+80% Damage|6|+175% Damage|9|+275% Damage|| Enum_Classe.Light|False|When a Light champion dies, all other Light champions gain Attack Speed and are healed for 25% of their Maximum Health.|3|+10% Attack Speed|6|+20% Attack Speed|9|+35% Attack Speed|| Enum_Classe.Mountain|False| |2|At the start of combat, a random ally gains a 1500 Stoneshield.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Ocean|False|All allies restore mana every 4 seconds.|2|+15 Mana|4|+30 Mana|6|+50 Mana|| Enum_Classe.Poison|False| |3|Poison champions apply Neurotoxin when they deal damage, increasing the target's mana cost by 50%.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Shadow|False|Shadow units deal increased damage for 5 seconds at combat start, refreshed on takedown.|2|+50% Increased Damage, Self Takedown|4|+100% Increased Damage, Any Shadow Takedown|-2| || Enum_Classe.Steel|False|Steel champions gain damage immunity for a few seconds when they are reduced below 50% health.|2|2 Seconds of Immunity|3|3 Seconds of Immunity.|4|4 Seconds of Immunity|| Enum_Classe.Variable|False| |1|Origin is determined by the Element of the current match. It can be Cloud, Inferno, Ocean, or Mountain.|-1| |-2| || Enum_Classe.Woodland|False| |3|At the start of combat, a random Woodland champion makes a copy of themselves.|-1| |-2|

This effect can stack any number of times.|| Dragon's Claw|Enum_Item.DragonsClaw|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Wearer gains 50% resistance to magic damage.|| Force of Nature|Enum_Item.ForceofNature|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.Spatula|Gain +1 team size.|| Frozen Heart|Enum_Item.FrozenHeart|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Reduce the Attack Speed of adjacent enemies by 35% for 1 second.|| Frozen Mallet|Enum_Item.FrozenMallet|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.Spatula|Wearer is also a Glacial.|| Giant Slayer|Enum_Item.GiantSlayer|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|The wearer's basic attacks deal an additional 5% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage.|| Guardian Angel|Enum_Item.GuardianAngel|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.ChainVest|When the wearer dies, they cleanse negative effects and revive with up to 500 Health after a 2 second delay. This effect can trigger once per combat.|| Guinsoo's Rageblade|Enum_Item.GuinsoosRageblade|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Attacks grant 4% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.|| Hand of Justice|Enum_Item.HandofJustice|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following: Basic Attacks and Spells deal +50% Damage or Basic Attacks heal 50 Health on-hit.|| Hextech Gunblade|Enum_Item.HextechGunblade|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Basic Attacks and spells heal the wearer for 25% of the damage dealt.|| Hush|Enum_Item.Hush|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to silence the target on-hit, prevent the enemy from gaining mana for 4 seconds.|| Iceborne Gauntlet|Enum_Item.IceborneGauntlet|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|When the wearer dodges, they create a zone of ice. Enemies inside the zone have their Attack Speed reduced by 35%.|| Inferno Cinder|Enum_Item.InfernoCinder|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Wearer is also an Inferno.|| Infinity Edge|Enum_Item.InfinityEdge|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|The wearer gains +125% Critical Strike Damage.|| Ionic Spark|Enum_Item.IonicSpark|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Whenever an enemy casts a spell, the wearer deals 125 true damage to the caster.|| Jeweled Gauntlet|Enum_Item.JeweledGauntlet|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|The wearer's spells can critically strike.|| Locket of the Iron Solari|Enum_Item.LocketoftheIronSolari|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 300 damage for 8 seconds.|| Luden's Echo|Enum_Item.LudensEcho|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|When the wearer deals damage with their spell, the first target hit and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 180 magic damage.|| Mage's Cap|Enum_Item.MagesCap|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Wearer is also a Mage.|| Morellonomicon|Enum_Item.Morellonomicon|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Spells burn for 20% of max HP over 10 seconds and reduce healing effects by 80%.|| Phantom Dancer|Enum_Item.PhantomDancer|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Wearer dodges all Critical Strikes.|| Quicksilver|Enum_Item.Quicksilver|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|The wearer gains a shield that prevents the next crowd control effect from applying. This shield refreshes after 3 seconds.|| Rabadon's Deathcap|Enum_Item.RabadonsDeathcap|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Wearer gains +50% Spell Power Amplification. (All sources of Spell Power are 50% more effective)|| Rapid Firecannon|Enum_Item.RapidFirecannon|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Wearer gains +100% Attack Range.|| Red Buff|Enum_Item.RedBuff|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Attacks burn for 20% of max HP over 10 seconds and reduce healing effects by 80%.|| Redemption|Enum_Item.Redemption|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|When the wearer falls below 30% Health, nearby allies are healed for 1200 Health after a 2.5 second delay. This effect can trigger once per combat.|| Repeating Crossbow|Enum_Item.RepeatingCrossbow|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally and grants additional +30% Attack Speed and +20% Critical Strike Chance (Stacks infinitely).|| Runaan's Hurricane|Enum_Item.RunaansHurricane|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Basic Attacks fire an additional missile at another nearby enemy, dealing 60% of the wearer's Attack damage and applying on-hit effects.|| Seraph's Embrace|Enum_Item.SeraphsEmbrace|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Regain 20 mana each time a spell is cast.|| Spear of Shojin|Enum_Item.SpearofShojin|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|After casting their spell, the wearer's Basic Attacks restore 18% of their Maximum Mana|| Statikk Shiv|Enum_Item.StatikkShiv|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 100 magical damage to 3 enemies.|| Sword Breaker|Enum_Item.SwordBreaker|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Wearer's Basic Attacks have a 33% chance to disarm the target for 3 seconds, preventing that enemy from Basic Attacking.|| Talisman of Light|Enum_Item.TalismanofLight|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.Spatula|Wearer is also a Light.|| Thief's Gloves|Enum_Item.ThiefsGloves|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.|| Thornmail|Enum_Item.Thornmail|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.ChainVest|When the wearer is hit by a Basic Attack, they reflect 100% of the mitigated damage as magic damage.|| Titanic Hydra|Enum_Item.TitanicHydra|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Basic Attacks deal an additional 3% of the wearer's Maximum Health as magic damage to the target and adjacent enemies behind them.|| Trap Claw|Enum_Item.TrapClaw|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.SparringGloves|At the beginning of combat, the wearer gains a shield that blocks the first enemy spell that hits them. The enemy that breaks the shield is stunned for 4 seconds.|| Warden's Mail|Enum_Item.WardensMail|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Wearer is also a Warden.|| Warmog's Armor|Enum_Item.WarmogsArmor|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Wearer regenerates 6% of missing health per second.|| Youmuu's Ghostblade|Enum_Item.YoumuusGhostblade|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.Spatula|Wearer is also an Assassin.|| Zeke's Herald|Enum_Item.ZekesHerald|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 2 hexes in the same row gain +15% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.|| Zephyr|Enum_Item.Zephyr|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 6 seconds.
